summary: The Creating Access to Necessary American-Canadian Duty Adjustments Act (CANADA Act) aims to exempt goods imported by or for small businesses from duties imposed by the national emergency declared on February 1, 2025. This exemption specifically targets duties related to Executive Orders 14193, 14197, and 14226 issued by the President. The bill is sponsored by Mr. Pappas and Ms. Goodlander and was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means.
